TEXT.TITLE: <INTERNATIONAL THOMSON ORGANISATION LTD> YEAR
TEXT.BODY: Shr 33p vs 38p Net 97 mln vs 111 mln Revs 1.71 billion vs 1.76 billion NOTE: Figures in sterling. Share results after deducting preferred share dividends of one mln pounds sterling in 1986. Reuter
